-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Lexer for Regular Expression accord to the XSD format
--   
--   Lexer for Regular Expression accord to the XSD format
@package lexregexxsd
@version 0.2.1.0


-- | Tokenize regular expressions according to the XSD standard. See
--   <a>http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema11-2/#regexs</a>
module RegexAlex

-- | Tokens for regular expressions.
data Token
Tcomma :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tdot :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tdash :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tbracketopen :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tbracketclose :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tcurlybracketopen :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tcurlybracketclose :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tsquarebracketopen :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tsquarebracketclose :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tesc :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tunion :: AlexPosn -> Token
Ttop :: AlexPosn -> Token
Tdigit :: AlexPosn -> Text -> Token
Tquantifier :: AlexPosn -> Text -> Token
Tformatesc :: AlexPosn -> Text -> Token
Tnormal :: AlexPosn -> Text -> Token

-- | Lexer for regular expressions.
regexLexer :: String -> [Token]
instance GHC.Show.Show RegexAlex.Token
instance GHC.Classes.Eq RegexAlex.Token
instance GHC.Show.Show RegexAlex.AlexPosn
instance GHC.Classes.Eq RegexAlex.AlexPosn
